name: Cisco | IOS | Network | MAC | MAC Flap (SYSLOG)
description: %SW_MATM-4-MACFLAP_NOTIF: Host 0017.0e82.0850 in vlan 254 is flapping between port Gi0/24 and port Gi0/25

patterns.value_re: %SW_MATM-4-MACFLAP_NOTIF: Host (?P<mac>\S+) in vlan (?P<vlan>\d+) is flapping between port (?P<from_interface>\S+) and port (?P<to_interface>\S+)$
